public static void setOverExistsFile(boolean flag)
set whether over cover the already existing destination file

参数：

copy

public static int copy(java.lang.String inFileName,
                       java.lang.String outFileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
Copy the contents of the given input File to the given output File. also copy the last modified time attribute

参数：
inFileName - the file to copy from
outFileName - the file to copy to
返回：
the number of bytes copied
抛出：
java.io.IOException - in case of I/O errors

copy

public static int copy(java.io.File inFile,
                       java.io.File outFile)
                throws java.io.IOException
Copy the contents of the given input File to the given output File.

参数：
inFile - the file to copy from
outFile - the file to copy to
返回：
the number of bytes copied
抛出：
java.io.IOException - in case of I/O errors
